description: Latex inner tubes are known for their high performance. They roll faster, are less prone to punctures, are lighter and quite simply better than standard butyl inner tubes. If you're riding deeps rims, you'll appreciate the removable valve core so you can use valve extenders.Ideal for racing and fast rides.Removable valve core lets you use valve extenders.Latex tubes require pumping before each ride, as they lose pressure over time.
name: Vittoria Competition Latex 700 x 25-28C Tube (48mm Presta)
